# NSView.BackgroundStyle

**Enumeration**

Background styles to apply to a view’s cell.

## Declaration

```swift
enum BackgroundStyle
```

## Overview

Apply these styles to the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCell/backgroundStyle] or [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCell/interiorBackgroundStyle] properties of an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCell] object.

## Getting the Background Styles

- **NSView.BackgroundStyle.normal**: A style that reflects the predominant color scheme of the view’s appearance.
- **NSView.BackgroundStyle.emphasized**: A style that adds emphasis to the background using an alternate color or visual effect.
- **NSView.BackgroundStyle.raised**: A style that makes the background appear higher than the content drawn on it.
- **NSView.BackgroundStyle.lowered**: A style that makes the background appear lower than the content drawn on it.

## Deprecated

- **light**: The background is a light color.
- **dark**: The background is a dark color.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Managing Display Attributes

- **isBezeled**: A Boolean value indicating whether the cell has a bezeled border.
- **isBordered**: A Boolean value indicating whether the cell draws itself outlined with a plain border.
- **isOpaque**: A Boolean value indicating whether the cell is completely opaque.
- **controlTint**: The cell’s control tint.
- **backgroundStyle**: The cell’s background style.
- **interiorBackgroundStyle**: The cell’s interior background style.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
